name: Nanite Takeover
description:
Nanite Takeover Description

Survive waves of Space Nanites as they try to destroy your ship! The odds seem against you but luckily your ship is equipped with Nanotechnology! With it, you can augment your ship with the bodies of the Space Nanites. All are good for armor.  A few types can even help fire back! How many Space Nanites can you take with you?

Controls

Keyboard / Mouse - WASD / arrow keys to navigate. Mouse to aim/fire.

Controller(Xbox One tested) - Left stick move. Right stick aim. Right trigger fire.

Touch Controls - Left stick move. Right stick rotate and fire.

Characters

Hopper- Equipped with nanotechnology, they can attach bodies of Space Nanites to their hull for both offensive and defensive purposes!

Monstros - While not aggressive,  this species of Space Nanite is very curious and have been known to accidentally crush hapless space cruisers.

Pacs  - These territorial Space Nanites will defend their turf and have been known to chase unlucky space trucks

Octos - Nefarious and intelligent.  For now, they don't seem to have been able to unlock the weapons they have been stealing from hacked drones.

TIPS

Oh, you made it this far? How about some tips!

  • The longer a Space Nanite is alive, the faster they move
  • The more Space Nanites that are attached to the Hopper, the more enemies will come. (this rate does not go back down so figure out that threshold!)
  • The greenish enemies (Octos and Drones) will shoot extra lasers when attached to the Hopper
  • The more Space Nanites attached to the Hopper, the slower they will be
  • Strategically attach Space Nanites in different configurations to maximize your chances.
  • Be sure to attach a layer of Space Nanites all around your ship to prevent a lucky Space Nanite from slipping in
  • Shooting a Space Nanite a second time will destroy it, which prevents you from attaching it to the Hopper. Be careful when arranging your shooting Space Nanites.
